import.armaments_list_exported: Armaments list exported to the text box.
settings.reset_confirm: Restore language, units, extra info, and default armaments?
credits.title: Credits
credits.line2: Made with lots of love and even more AI by Javiito_CL.
air.available_note: Available aircraft | The selected aircraft is ACTIVE
radio.checkin_ack: check-in received, hold position and await instructions, out.
hint.3l.l1: [L1 IP / BP]: Initial reference point from which the aircraft starts or references the approach
hint.3l.l2: [L2 Target description]: Physical/functional description for positive identification
hint.3l.l3: [L3 Friendly location]: Position of friendly forces relative to the target
hint.6l.l1: [L1 IP / BP]: Initial Point or Battle Position used as entry reference
hint.6l.l2: [L2 Heading]: Heading from IP/BP to the target to orient the run
hint.6l.l3: [L3 Distance]: Distance from IP/BP to the target
hint.6l.l4: [L4 Elevation]: Target elevation above sea level, in meters
hint.6l.l5: [L5 Target description]: Physical/functional description for positive identification
hint.6l.l6: [L6 Coordinates]: Precise or reference target location. Coordinates expressed in [X axis] and [Y axis] with 6/8/10 digits.
hint.9l.l1: [L1 IP / BP]: Initial Point or Battle Position designated to start the attack
hint.9l.l2: [L2 Heading]: Heading from IP/BP to the target to orient the run
hint.9l.l3: [L3 Distance]: Distance from IP/BP to the target
hint.distance_m: [L3 Distance]: Distance from IP/BP to the target (meters)
hint.distance_ft: [L3 Distance]: Distance from IP/BP to the target (feet)
hint.9l.l4: [L4 Elevation]: Target elevation above sea level, in meters
hint.9l.l5: [L5 Target description]: Detailed target description for identification
hint.9l.l6: [L6 Coordinates]: Precise or reference target location. Coordinates expressed in [X axis] and [Y axis] with 6/8/10 digits.
hint.9l.l7: [L7 Mark type]: Method used to mark the target (laser, smoke, IR, tracers)
hint.9l.l8: [L8 Friendly troops]: Position and distance of friendly forces relative to the target
hint.9l.l9: [L9 Egress]: Recommended exit direction or route after attack
hint.air_l1: [L1 CALLSIGN]: Tactical callsign of the aircraft or flight
hint.air_l4: [L4 ORDNANCE]: Available or selected ordnance (separate with ,)
hint.air_l5: [L5 PLAYTIME]: Estimated time the aircraft can remain on station
hint.air_l6: [L6 ABORT CODE]: Verbal code to abort the attack immediately
hint.air_l7: [L7 REMARKS]: Additional observations not included elsewhere
hint.req_munition: [e.g. GBU-12 / Rockets / Gun run]: Requested or recommended ordnance
hint.cs_ground: [Ground Commander]: Name or initials of the ground commander
hint.castype_1: [CAS Type 1]: Type 1 control with visual on target
hint.castype_2: [CAS Type 2]: Type 2 control without visual on target
hint.castype_3: [CAS Type 3]: Type 3 control with clearance window/conditions
hint.omit_l1_l3: [Omit L1 to L3]: Indicates lines 1 to 3 are omitted because the aircraft is overhead
hint.include_remarks: [Remarks]: Section for restrictions, coordination, and additional considerations
hint.preauth: [Preauthorized]: Indicates the attack has prior authorization
hint.killbox_toggle: [Killbox]: Indicates active Killbox for preauthorized attack
hint.killbox_input: [Killbox]: Assigned Killbox identifier (e.g., Alpha 1 becomes Alpha keypad 1)
hint.allies_in_area: [Allies in area]: Indicates friendly forces are in the area
hint.danger_close: [Danger close]: Indicates friendlies are close to the target
hint.danger_deg: [Degrees (0-360)]: Relative direction of friendly forces to the target
hint.danger_dist: [Meters]: Distance between friendly forces and the target
hint.vector_final: [Final vector]: Recommended heading for the final attack run
hint.vector_deg: [Degrees (0-360)]: Recommended final heading for the attack run
hint.vector_var: [Degrees]: Variation applied to the final heading
hint.minutes_toggle: [Minutes]: Enables a minutes window or timer
hint.cas_remarks: [Remarks]: Final safety, coordination, or restriction comments
dict.visual: Visual: Pilot sees friendly ground forces/marking (Strobe/Smoke).
dict.blind: Blind: Pilot cannot see the friendly forces. (Caution state!)
dict.tally: Tally: Pilot sees the target. Required for "Cleared Hot."
dict.nojoy: No Joy: Pilot cannot see the target/landmark. Trigger "Restart Talk-on."
dict.contact: Contact: Pilot sees a specific reference point (Bridge, Road, Hill).
dict.captured: Captured: Pilot has the target on their Targeting Pod (TGP) screen.
